message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only do $105 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $110, but I think it's a great deal for both of us.
